result.execSummary:
The defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank; surcharge WAIVED. Court WAIVED all applicable costs, fees and surcharges due to defendant financial instability.
- Restitution set at 0.
Concurrent with: Any other sentence; TIME SERVED DISPOSITION

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shelbie Marie Klopp

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.   
As to count 1
Court ordered defendant to serve 11 days in the House of Correction Concurrent to any other sentence, with 11 days credit for time served.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

Court WAIVED applicable costs, fees and surcharges due to defendant financial instability 

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank - surcharge WAIVED.
Court advised defendant of his right to seek postconviction relief within 20 days.
Court order restitution set at 0.

Filed:
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
As to Count 1
Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court via-telephone, defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Attorney Joel Mogren appeared via-telephone, unavailable for today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Defense counsel is awaiting discovery from prior counsel, state will turn over to defense.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney George Kidd on behalf of attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status of counsel, new defense appointed. For reasons stated on the record,   Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 31.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. 

Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel along with the defendant will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel.  Case adjourned for status of counsel in branch 31.  Status conference scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Motion for Notification and Termination of Counsel.

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea hearing. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31. All parties are notified that effective 12-1-15 this case will be assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 14, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea. Court is in jury trial for today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Parties request a Plea Hearing date.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.
Case adjourned to 10-29-2015 at 1:30 PM - Br. 37, Judge Dee's Court for Projected Plea Hearing.

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status conference. 

Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant.  Case adjourned for status of counsel in branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for September 10, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Notification and Termination of Counsel.
Letter from defendant filing "Notification and Termination of Counsel".

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.    Defense counsel has received discovery and offer. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 07-07-2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Shelbie Marie Klopp
Current: 2674 South 13th Street, #11, Milwaukee, WI 53215   (Effective: 06-01-2015)
Prior: 2674 South 13th Street, #11, Milwaukee, WI 53215
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

As an additional condition of bail:
Oral No Contact Order with any WalMart retail store

Defendant Shelbie Marie Klopp in court.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
OCCR Tape#15-104

Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 37 for a Pretrial Conference.
Clerk:  jms
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 06-01-2015 at 01:30pm
